page.title: 17Fishing in Irthlingborough
page.content:
In Irthlingborough, at the fishing club, they have a session of fishing each week and after each session,the catch is weighed and points are awarded.These points are accumulative and at the end of the season, the person with the most points is awarded a cup and the title of "Champion", there are also runner up medals. The fishing is coarse fishing for roach, carp,bream,tench,perch,pike,rudd and eel. The fish are plentiful and are of a good size. On a good day an average catch is 3 to 4 lbs.
Record Catches. Carp 14 lbs Roach 1 lb 12ozs Bream 7 lbs Tench 7 lbs Perch 2 lbs Pike 18 lbs Rudd 2 lbs
